name: OQT-BOS Development and Evolution Plan
description: The official, time-boxed roadmap for the phased rollout and feature enhancement of the Octiumetrifloundiatremorphteletopontoladerallquantic Braided OS within the NeuralBlitz UEF/SIMI framework.

v11.2.go_no_go_gate: Successful completion of all `BOS-INTEGRITY` stress tests (Volume XIII) with zero critical failures.

deliverables.title: General Availability of Core APIs and NBCL Verbs
deliverables.description: Fully functional and documented `/os.onton.*`, `/os.braid.*`, and `/os.meta.*` NBCL commands and their corresponding RESTful API endpoints in the HALIC.
success_metrics: 100% of defined NBCL verbs in `API_and_Command_Set.yaml` are functional.
API endpoints pass all integration tests with <50ms latency (p99).

deliverables.title: Implementation of TensorKnotGateInterpreterCK
deliverables.description: The first core `OQT-BOS`-specific Capability Kernel, providing the execution engine for all `/os.braid.mutate` commands and topological operations.
success_metrics: Achieves >90 KTkGs/s (Kilo Tensor Knot Gates per second) on A100 baseline.
Zero topological invariant violations under the `braid_corruption.py` chaos test.

v11.5.theme: Visualization, Ψ-State Integration, and Advanced Logic
v11.5.go_no_go_gate: Demonstrated stability of Ψ-State feedback loop (Δc < 0.25 under load) and successful Charter quorum for ε₁₁ proposal.

deliverables.title: SOPES 3D Braid Visualizer General Availability
deliverables.description: A production-ready, interactive WebGL component for visualizing and manipulating `braid` structures in real-time.
success_metrics: Renders braids with up to 1000 crossings at >120fps.

deliverables.title: Live Ψ-State Feedback Integration
deliverables.description: The `OQT-BOS` `ε-tensor` (Ψ-State) is fully integrated into the ReflexælCore drift monitor and the HALIC UI, providing real-time feedback on the OS's cognitive and ethical state.
success_metrics: Anomaly detection rate > 90% in `Ψ-State-Adversary` stress tests.
HALIC UI widget accurately reflects simulated emotional states.

v12.0.go_no_go_gate: Successful community governance ballot pass for making OQT-BOS a core scheduling component.

deliverables.title: Default Resource Scheduler for Quantic Operations
deliverables.description: The OQT-BOS graduates from a specialized system to become the default scheduling and resource management layer for all `quantic`-tagged operations, optimizing resource use via topological analysis.
success_metrics: Measurable reduction in resource contention for quantum workloads by >15%.
Full backwards compatibility with non-quantic CKs.

deliverables.title: Teletopo- Federation Protocol (v1.0)
deliverables.description: Implementation of the `λ-Field Teletopo Handshake` protocol, enabling secure, entangled state transfers between federated NeuralBlitz instances or other compliant AOIs.
success_metrics: Successful, verifiable state transfer between two sandboxed instances with <1% information loss.
